00149 template<class Archive>
00150 inline void save_construct_data(
00151     Archive & ar, const LuoRudyIModel1991OdeSystem * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00152 {
00153     const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> p_solver = t->GetSolver();
00154     const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> p_stimulus = t->GetStimulusFunction();
00155     ar << p_solver;
00156     ar << p_stimulus;
00157 }
00158 
00165 template<class Archive>
00166 inline void load_construct_data(
00167     Archive & ar, LuoRudyIModel1991OdeSystem * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00168 {
00169 
00170     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> p_solver;
00171     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractStimulusFunction> p_stimulus;
00172     ar >> p_solver;
00173     ar >> p_stimulus;
00174     ::new(t)LuoRudyIModel1991OdeSystem(p_solver, p_stimulus);
00175 }
